author: caiocollalto

text:
not if you use invincibility,like me -.^ 
the secret to using it is:
go onto options when the game starts, go to the juke box, and click c (i think) on each of these songs, in this order:
3, 12, 17, 2, 2, 10, 2, 7, 7, 11
you should hear sketch's super hero form say "oh yeah!"
now you can use as many planes as you want!

author: cameony

text: night and day difference man, without invulnerability the game is actually one of the hardest if not THE hardest. Plenty of the traps are instant death and the exploding barrels scattered around chew through 2/3ds of your life bar. Enemies are also wicked cheap but not nearly as deadly as the traps.
